column5: This is a propoganda video released by North Korea.I think it is funny (war is not), if mods feel different I have no objection to it being removed. Content is clean.  http://video.ca.msn.com/?mkt=en-ca&vid=2d463395-0b25-4c4e-b8d2-2e0b415ac114&from=sharepermalink&src=v5:share:sharepermalink:
You not thinking of moving over there now are you? Notice all the snow remarks in that video, what they are really saying is WE DON"T ICE FISH
The sad thing is the average North Korean probably believes this 100%.
And don't forget the yummy birds they eat all the time
LOL i wonder what the americans in the south do without all the precious snow?
This is pretty sad, considering I'm pretty sure they believe it. It makes you wonder what our Canadian/American governments have done,showed to us that have completely fooled us though.
Looks like it was fake, made up by British travel writer Alun Hill.
Still worth a good laugh Joey. Thanks for the info.
I don't get it, where's the propaganda? I love snow coffee with a crispy bird.
LMAO this is real?  i guess they sum it up "All Americans are poor, homeless and homosexual"
Yes, it definately was Nipfisher, I had to watch it twice and laughed both times
That coffee made from snow must be pretty cold. I guess it's like icetea.

"There are no birds in the trees because the Americans ate them all!!!"  "There are no birds in the trees, except these few that are going to be eaten Tuesday!!!!"  I talked to my American friends today and they said that they really enjoyed the North Korean cakes and coffee!!!
This video is crazy.  The cold, lonely and homosexual North Americans hurdle together to keep warm...   what the hell?
lol Two funniest lines in the video!
"With their dead friends in the blue bags" lmao.
